ComicInfo.Summary:
As Dorothy continues her quest for the Veridian Scepter things go from bad to worse for her and her companions. The Wicked Witch of the West has no intention of letting her find the powerful weapon and the army of flying terrors she sends to stop them is more than they our heroes can handle. Their attack leaves Dorothy as the witches prisoner where torture and torment are the least of her worries. The Witch has grand plans for Dorothy and her companions and not all of them will survive to see them come to pass.
